system.description: When you ask someone to work with you, roll +Sway. On a hit they'll do it if you meet their terms.

failure.label: Miss (6-)
failure.value: They refuse outright or make demands you cannot meet.

partial.label: Weak Hit (7-9)
partial.value:
On 7-9 their player picks two and both must be met:

They'll only do it if...

  • ...a third party vouches for you.
  • ...they can add or remove specific things to the task.
  • ...they can back out as soon as the task costs them anything.
  • ...you reduce the threat you pose to them.
  • ...you can give them something now that's worth it.
  • ...you reveal your full agenda here.
  • ...their faction/family gets 1 Treaty on your Family.

success.label: Strong Hit (10+)
success.value:
On a 10+ they pick one:

They'll only do it if...

  • ...a third party vouches for you.
  • ...they can add or remove specific things to the task.
  • ...they can back out as soon as the task costs them anything.
  • ...you reduce the threat you pose to them.
  • ...you can give them something now that's worth it.
  • ...you reveal your full agenda here.
  • ...their faction/family gets 1 Treaty on your Family.
